---
id: pix-dict-claim-list-v-2
title: "List claims"
description: "Gets a list of claims, sorted in ascending order by the `LastModified` field, according to the filters passed."
sidebar_label: "List claims"
hide_title: true
hide_table_of_contents: true
api: 
sidebar_class_name: "get api-method"

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"List claims"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/v2/pix/dict/claim"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Gets a list of claims, sorted in ascending order by the `LastModified` field, according to the filters passed.

Comments:

- Updating information from claims to listings is asynchronous to adding and updating records, so there may be a 5 second delay before added or changed data appears in the query.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"examples":{"ClaimIsDonor":{"value":"true"}},"name":"isDonor","description":"Restricts claims where the participant is a donor","schema":{"type":"boolean"},"in":"query"},{"examples":{"ClaimIsClaimer":{"value":"true"}},"name":"isClaimer","description":"Restricts claims where the participant is a claimant","schema":{"type":"boolean"},"in":"query"},{"examples":{"ClaimListStatus":{"value":"\"WAITING_RESOLUTION\""}},"name":"status","description":"Claim status","schema":{"enum":["OPEN","WAITING_RESOLUTION","CONFIRMED","CANCELLED","COMPLETED"],"type":"string"},"in":"query"},{"examples":{"ClaimListType":{"value":"\"OWNERSHIP\""}},"name":"type","description":"Claim type","schema":{"enum":["OWNERSHIP","PORTABILITY"],"type":"string"},"in":"query"},{"examples":{"ClaimModifiedAfter":{"value":"\"2018-02-10T09:30.000Z\""}},"name":"modifiedAfter","description":"Filters claims with modified date-time greater than or equal to modifiedAfter","schema":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"},"in":"query"},{"examples":{"ClaimModifiedBefore":{"value":"\"2018-02-10T09:30.000Z\""}},"name":"modifiedBefore","description":"Filters claims with modified date-time less than or equal to modifiedBefore","schema":{"format":"date-time","type":"string"},"in":"query"},{"examples":{"ClaimLimit":{"value":"20"}},"name":"limit","description":"Default: 20\r\nLimit number of claims to return","schema":{"type":"integer"},"in":"query"}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
